Khata Sutta：1．Khata Sutta．-A man who praises and blames without scrutiny，who shows appreciation or displeasure without testing the object thereof - such a one carries with him an uprooted，lifeless self．Not so the man who has the opposite qualities．A．ii．2f．



2．Khata Sutta．-A man guilty of wrong conduct towards mother，father，the Tathāgata or a Tathāgata’s followers is possessed of an uprooted，lifeless self．A．ii．4f．
